acceptedAnswer.text: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) measures how long it takes for the largest visible element to load on your page. Google considers LCP a Core Web Vital, directly impacting your SEO rankings.

mainEntity.name: Why does Largest Contentful Paint matter for shoes & footwear stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) measures how long it takes for the largest visible element to load on your page. Google considers LCP a Core Web Vital, directly impacting your SEO rankings. Google recommends LCP under 2.5 seconds for a 'good' user experience, with anything over 4 seconds considered poor.

mainEntity.name: What is a good Largest Contentful Paint for Shopify shoes & footwear stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 40 Shopify shoes & footwear stores, the median largest contentful paint is 9.9s. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 3.6s. Google recommends LCP under 2.5 seconds for a 'good' user experience, with anything over 4 seconds considered poor.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my shoes & footwear store's Largest Contentful Paint?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optimize and compress hero images using modern formats like WebP or AVIF. Implement lazy loading for below-the-fold images and defer non-critical JavaScript. Use a Content Delivery Network (CDN) to serve assets from edge locations closer to users. Preload critical resources and fonts to reduce render-blocking time. acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your largest contentful paint against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 9.9s (the median), you're in the top half of shoes & footwear stores. If you're better than 3.6s, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
